entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 04:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
